strapiPost.title: Topgolf Live Coming To Razorback Stadium
strapiPost.topic: Sponsored by University of Arkansas Athletics
strapiPost.content:
If you’re a fan of golf and Razorback football, or just fun in general, this is for you. The Topgolf Live Stadium Tour is coming to the Donald W. Reynolds Razorback Stadium on May 5-8! 

  • Above the field: The Topgolf Live experience is making stops at some of the country’s most iconic venues and offering fans a one-of-a-kind opportunity to tee it up in their favorite stadiums. Attendees will be able to hit golf balls from a tee box at on-field targets placed between 60-140 yards out to earn points. 
  • Tee off: Toptracer technology accurately traces the flight path of golf balls, instantly scoring every shot in an interactive, in-stadium game. If you're not a golfer, don't worry, games are designed for all skill levels. Individual tickets are on sale now, so grab yours and go have some fun!

Click HERE for tickets.
